src:
Round-Up 5 Berita Terpopuler
Sri Mulyani Respons soal Aibon Rp 82 M di APBD, Suryo Utomo Dirjen Pajak
01 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati/Foto: ANTARA FOTO/Puspa Perwitasari

Jakarta - Berita terpopuler detikFinance Jumat (1/11/2019) adalah tentang Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati yang menyatakan akan mengecek sistem penganggaran di APBD. Pernyataan itu disampaikan Sri Mulyani merespons anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82 miliar yang sempat tercantum pada e-budgeting Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta.Selain soal anggaran lem Aibon Rp 82 miliar, berita terpopuler lainnya adalah Suryo Utomo dilantik sebagai Dirjen Pajak. Mantan Staf Ahli Menteri Keuangan bidang Kepatuhan Pajak ini menggantikan Robert Pakpahan yang masuk masa pensiun.Mau tahu informasi selanjutnya? Baca 5 berita detikFinance terpopuler berikut ini: (hns/hns)
text:
Round-Up of 5 Most Popular News
Sri Mulyani Responses to Aibon Rp. 82 billion in the Regional Budget, Suryo Utomo Director General of Taxes
Nov 01 2019, 2:00 PM by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati / Photo: BETWEEN PHOTOS / Puspa Perwitasari

Jakarta - detikFinance's most popular news Friday (1/11/2019) is about the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati who said he would check the budgeting system in the budget. The statement was made by Sri Mulyani in response to the Aibon glue budget of Rp. 82 billion, which was listed in the e-budgeting of the Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta. In addition to the Aibon glue budget of Rp. 82 billion, another popular news was that Suryo Utomo was appointed as Director General of Taxes. The former Expert Staff of the Minister of Finance in Tax Compliance replaces Robert Pakpahan who is retiring. Do you want to know more information? Read the following 5 detikFinance news stories: (hns / hns)
